5a1384558bf55085c847966b.description:
+200 Health
+50% Base Health Regen
+150% Base Mana Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Active: Target an area within 5500 range. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to heal allies for 10 (+20 per level of target) Health, burn enemy champions for 10% of their maximum Health as true damage and deal 250 true damage to enemy minions (120 second cooldown). Heal and Shield Power is 3 times as effective on Redemption's heal.

Can be used while dead.

Half effect if the target has been affected by another Redemption recently.
5a1384558bf55085c847966b.name: Redemption

5a1384558bf55085c8479701.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive: +8% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Your heals and shields on another allied champion grant them 20% - 35% Attack Speed and their attacks drain 20 - 35 health on-hit for 6 seconds.

(This does not include regeneration effects or effects on yourself. Bonus effects are based on target's level.)
5a1384558bf55085c8479701.name: Ardent Censer

5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f9.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f9.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Hecarim releases a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from him for {{ e2 }} second.

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f9.name: Onslaught of Shadows

5a1385ee8bf55085c847d2fe.description:
Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored.

Bravado-empowered attacks reduce this recharge time more than usual.
5a1385ee8bf55085c847d2fe.tooltip:
Spends all charges to heal nearby allied champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of maximum Health) per charge, up to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) at maximum charges.
Maximum charges: {{ e6 }}

Bravado-empowered attacks grant 1 charge of Starlight's Touch.
5a1385ee8bf55085c847d2fe.name: Starlight's Touch

5a1385ef8bf55085c847d2ff.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
5a1385ef8bf55085c847d2ff.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ e2 }} seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.
5a1385ef8bf55085c847d2ff.name: Mystic Shot

5a1385f08bf55085c847d302.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
5a1385f08bf55085c847d302.tooltip:
Passive: The Ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e4 }}% of the shield value: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).
5a1385f08bf55085c847d302.name: Command: Protect

5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f7.tooltip:
Passive: Whenever Zed and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability, Zed gains {{ e3 }} energy. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for {{ e1 }} seconds.
Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f7.name: Living Shadow
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f7.description: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.

5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f8.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f8.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2f8.name: Devastating Charge

5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fa.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fa.tooltip: Rolls a short distance. The next basic attack within {{ e1 }} seconds deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, equal to {{ e2 }}% of total Attack Damage.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fa.name: Tumble

5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fc.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fc.tooltip: Fires a bolt that knocks back target enemy and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies that collide with terrain take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) additional physical damage and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fc.name: Condemn

5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fb.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum Health as true damage.

Deals a maximum of 200 damage vs. Monsters and a minimum of {{ e2 }} damage vs. all targets.
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fb.name: Silver Bolts
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fb.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fd.tooltip:
Gains {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. While active, Tumble grants Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second, and Night Hunter's bonus Movement Speed is increased to {{ e4 }}.

16
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fd.name: Final Hour
5a1385ed8bf55085c847d2fd.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.

5a1385f08bf55085c847d300.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
5a1385f08bf55085c847d300.tooltip:
Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first enemy champion hit. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows for {{ e4 }} seconds by up to {{ e3 }}% based on the victim's missing health.

If the victim falls below {{ e2 }}% health while impaled, Urgot may recast this ability, suppressing the victim and dragging them in for execution. Activates automatically if the target is below {{ e2 }}% at the end of the effect.

When Urgot executes a victim, nearby enemies flee in terror for {{ e0 }} seconds.
5a1385f08bf55085c847d300.name: Fear Beyond Death

5a1385f08bf55085c847d301.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
5a1385f08bf55085c847d301.tooltip: Next basic attack deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and stuns for {{ e1 }} second.
5a1385f08bf55085c847d301.name: Shield of Daybreak

5a13876b8bf55085c847fd1a.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 3.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
5a13876b8bf55085c847fd1a.name: Sunlight

5a13876b8bf55085c847fd19.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers. She gains 30 Movement Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
5a13876b8bf55085c847fd19.name: Night Hunter
